note.p: Education: Westminster School; Magdalene College, Cambridge (admitted 1664); Inner Temple (admitted 1658)
Career: Called to the Bar (1669); MP for Horsham (1669-1679); Commissioner for Assessment for Warwickshire (1673-1680), and for Coventry (1677-1679); Commissioner for Recusants for Sussex (1675)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Hunter; Henning; Foster Lancs; GEC Baronetage; Venn; Barker

Notes: Henning and Barker give baptism date as 09 December 1649. Hunter says this OB is not in 'Record' but there were definitely two of them. Charter Book shows three signatures of Orlando Bridgeman, two of which were probably done by the same person (all on same page)
